original_title: Oon mä ollut paha mut oon mä ollut hyväkin
overview: I've been bad but I've been good too wraps the film's materiality in time, the aging body and the multi-generational bodily experience of excess. A childish or strange narrator's voice speaks to a grandma and at the same time to women and mothers across generations and strata of history.
title: I’ve Been Bad But I’ve Been Good Too
